channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Je suis monté à bord du Kia EV2, et j’ai trouvé que cette voiture électrique abordable pouvait battre la Renault 4 E-Tech
item.description: Kia s'attaque au marché des petits SUV avec son EV2, une voiture électrique calibrée pour se battre contre les Renault 4 E-Tech et Peugeot 2008. J'ai pu partir à sa découverte, voici mon premier avis.

item.title: « Nous achetons presque tous les PC » : face à la pénurie, cette boutique supplie ses clients de leur revendre leur vieille machine
item.description: La crise de la mémoire RAM oblige certains revendeurs à sortir le portefeuille pour garnir leur étagères. Tous ceux qui ont un PC à revendre sont courtisés.

item.title: X Didn't Fix Grok's ‘Undressing’ Problem. It Just Makes People Pay for It
item.description: X is only allowing “verified” users to create images with Grok. Experts say it represents the “monetization of abuse”—and anyone can still generate images on Grok’s app and website.

item.title: Why are cybercriminals getting younger?
item.description: The suspects behind attacks are not veteran threat actors – they’re teenagers using Ransomware-as-a-Service tools to inflict multimillion-pound damage.

item.title: Comparatif : quelles sont les meilleures enceintes Bluetooth en 2026 ?
item.description: Compactes et nomades, les enceintes Bluetooth s'invitent partout : du salon à la plage, elles sont devenues indispensables. Bienvenue sur notre sélection des meilleurs modèles testés par nos soins.

item.title: All the tech and gadgets announced at CES 2026
item.description: It's the first week of a new year and there's no time for the tech world to slowly ease back into things following the holidays. That's because CES 2026 is in full swing, with all manner of companies descending on Las Vegas to reveal their latest innovations and what they're planning to bring your way in the near future. Many of the Engadget crew are on the ground to check out as much of the new tech as possible. Of course, we're keeping tabs on all of the major CES press conferences too. Samsung held its First Look presentation, which focuses on home products, while LG has shown off a wide ar...

item.title: Cloudflare and La Liga's conflict deepens as piracy legal battle continues
item.description: The conflict between La Liga and Cloudflare has escalated into a full-blown legal battle. While La Liga accuses the tech firm of acting as a "digital shield" for pirates, Cloudflare claims that blocking orders harm legitimate internet users.

item.title: This Apple 25W MagSafe charger is on sale for only $30
item.description:
If you want a wireless charger for your iPhone and prefer to stick with Apple, Amazon has a sale that may pique your interest. The retailer is selling the one meter Apple Magsafe charger for $30, saving you $10 off the regular price, while also selling the two meter model for $40 ($10 off).
If you have an iPhone 16, iPhone 17 or iPhone Air, this cable can charge your device at 25W as long as it's connected to a 30W power adapter on the other end. While you'll need a more recent iPhone to get the fastest MagSafe charging speeds, the charger can wirelessly top up the battery of any iPhone from...

item.title: Trouvez réponse à vos questions | Boîte de réception
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies.

item.title: Plus de cernes et un cornichon : voici les 19 nouveaux emojis prévus pour 2026
item.description: Pour l’année 2026, ce sont 19 nouveaux emojis qui ont été présélectionnés, incluant un cornichon, un phare ou encore un visage marqué par la fatigue. Voici ce qui nous attend.

item.title: Discovery of Oldest Known Cremation in Africa Sparks Archaeological Mystery
item.description: A 9,500-year-old cremation site in Malawi is rewriting what we thought we knew about ancient funerals.

item.title: The 5 best gadgets IKEA announced at CES 2026 – including a smart version of my favorite lamp
item.description: The Varmblixt smart lamp was just the start - here are the 5 best things IKEA unveiled at CES 2026.

item.title: Industrial AI applied: where the real revolution is happening
item.description: While Big Tech chases trillion-dollar AI bubbles, industrial applications quietly prove genuine business value.

item.title: New Documentary ‘Starman’ Asks the Big Question: Are We Alone in the Universe? (Exclusive)
item.description: Watch the trailer for Robert Stone's cinematic portrait of NASA engineer and sci-fi author Gentry Lee.

Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. At CES 2026 this week, people […]

item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (January 9)
item.description: From the return of hit shows to this year's Golden Globes ceremony, here's what you won't want to miss this weekend.

item.title: Sharpa's ping-pong playing, blackjack dealing humanoid is working overtime at CES 2026
item.description: There were no idle hands at Sharpa's CES booth. The company's humanoid may have been the busiest bot at show, autonomously playing ping-pong, dealing blackjack games and taking selfies with passersby. On display wasn't just the robot and its smarts, but also SharpaWave, a highly dexterous 1:1 scale human hand. The hand has 22 active degrees of freedom, according to the company, allowing for precise and intricate finger movements. It mirrored my gestures as I wiggled my hand in front of its camera, getting everything mostly right, which was honestly pretty cool. Each fingertip contains a minica...

item.title: Processeurs PC portable : AMD affirme que sa puce Strix Halo « écrase » Intel
item.description: Vous pensiez qu'Intel avait plié le game avec son iGPU Arc B390 capable de rivaliser avec une RTX 4050 ? Pas si vite. AMD vient de réagir officiellement.

item.title: Amazon UK's big weekend sale is live — I've found the 18 best deals from £9.99
item.description: I've searched through this weekend's sale at Amazon UK and hand-picked the 18 best deals I'd recommend buying if you're hunting for a tech bargain.

item.title: Le « vaisseau spatial » de Hyundai passe à l’électrique : 20 min de charge, 9 places et un intérieur digne de la classe affaires
item.description: Présentée au Salon de Bruxelles, la version électrifiée du monospace coréen frappe fort. Attendue depuis quelques années par les familles nombreuses et les professionnels du transport de personne en quête de mobilité zéro émission, ce Staria Electric promet de bousculer un segment encore timide face à l'électrification.

item.title: The new Anker 45W Nano charger with smart display from CES is $10 off already
item.description: Anker rolled out a bunch of new chargers and other gear at CES 2026, including a cute one that's already on sale. The new Nano charger with smart display, which is an upgrade to the existing Nano charger in Anker's lineup, is on sale for $30 right now while you can pre-order it. That's $10 off the regular MSRP, and shipments will start going out on January 20. The 45W charger includes a smart display that shows real-time data like power flow, temperature and charging status. It also features "fun animations to keep things cheerful." Anker says it can recognize what's being charged and automati...

item.title: C’est la fin d’une galère sur Word : ajouter un lien devient instantané
item.description: Cette fois, ce n’est ni de l’IA ni un nouveau ruban « intelligent », mais une amélioration ultra-basique… et franchement utile. Microsoft vient de confirmer une petite révolution dans Word : ajouter un lien va enfin devenir aussi simple qu’un copier‑coller.

item.title: Écran XXL, design séduisant et prix compétitif : face au Tesla Model Y, Mazda lance une étonnante voiture électrique
item.description: Avec son nouveau SUV électrique CX-6e, Mazda frappe fort. Design harmonieux, écran géant de 26 pouces et prix agressif : cette voiture électrique a-t-elle les arguments pour inquiéter le Tesla Model Y ?

item.title: On est montés à bord du Fiat Tris : nos photos de l’utilitaire insolite du salon de Bruxelles
item.description: On ne s'attendait pas vraiment à ça de la part de Fiat Professional. Le Tris n'est pas une voiture, c'est un outil. Pas de volant, mais un guidon. Pas de vitesse, mais 45 km/h en pointe. C'est l'anti-voiture par excellence.

item.title: The Vergecast Live at CES 2026: What is the point of a robot that falls over?
item.description: This year's CES was an odd one. This is a conference usually dominated by futuristic, expensive TVs and futuristic, expensive cars, but those things weren't what dominated CES 2026. Instead, Las Vegas was filled with new ideas about old gadgets and showed us a whole lot of really impressive hardware waiting on software to catch […]

item.title: EU goes soft on Big Tech in digital rules overhaul
item.description: EU Digital Networks Act will require telecoms firms to modernize their networks, but Big Tech is mostly immune.

item.title: Boulanger lance une grande braderie lors des soldes : les 20 deals qui méritent votre argent ce week-end
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver viennent tout juste de débuter et Boulanger n’a pas perdu de temps pour lancer de belles promotions. L’enseigne met en avant ses meilleures offres Tech pour le week-end. De quoi bien commencer l’année 2026.

item.title: La génération d’images de Grok maintenant payante : un cache-misère qui n’empêche pas les dérives
item.description: Suite, et certainement pas fin, du feuilleton Grok. xAI, la start-up IA d'Elon Musk, limite désormais la génération d'images aux utilisateurs payants de X (anciennement Twitter). Une contrainte qui ne va pas faire grand chose pour réduire le volume d'images sexualisées de femmes et d'enfants sur le réseau social.

item.title: AirTag deal: Get four of the Bluetooth trackers for only $65
item.description:
Apple keeps most of its product pricing on a tight leash, but we do see the company's AirTags go on sale pretty frequently. Another cost cut has come around for this item just in time for the holidays. Amazon is currently selling a four-pack of AirTags for $65. At a third off the regular cost, that price is pretty close to the record low discount of $63 we've seen for these Bluetooth trackers.
AirTags can be useful for people who travel frequently, helping you to keep track of essentials like your passport as well as a way to keep tabs on luggage while you're on the go. If you do purchase so...

item.title: 12 Hiroshima bombs every second: Here’s how much Earth’s oceans warmed in 2025
item.description: An analysis from 50 scientists found that ocean temperatures hit a new record high last year, an alarming sign for global warming and rising sea levels. The world’s oceans once again hit a record high temperature in 2025, storing more heat than during any previous year since modern recording began.

item.title: Kia’s EV2 is its smallest and most affordable EV for Europe
item.description: Kia unveiled the EV2, a small and affordably priced electric vehicle built for the European market. The EV2 made its debut at the Brussels Auto Show, where executives touted it as its "most compact" EV to date. Of course, it was another in a long line of affordable, capable, and impressively designed EVs that won't […]

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : la 4K est à petit prix dans cette sélection des meilleures offres sur les TV et les vidéoprojecteurs
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver font moins de bruit que le Black Friday, mais cela reste une occasion de dénicher de belles affaires. Sur les TV 4K et les vidéoprojecteurs par exemple, pour remplacer son écran poussiéreux par une dalle OLED flambant neuve ou un vidéoprojecteur dernier cri.

item.title: X-Chair X-Tech review: My kids called this an office chair built for the boss - and with its cooling, heating, and massaging features, I agree
item.description: The X-Chair X-Tech is a fantastic ergonomic option for those who desire massaging, cooling, and heating, plus the comfortable seat, great ergonomics, leg rest, and flexible armrests, all of which result in a fantastic bang for your buck

item.title: We might see a successor to the MSI Claw 8 AI+ soon, as Intel promises plenty of gaming handhelds with Panther Lake CPUs
item.description: Intel isn't slowing down with its handheld ambitions, and it's promising a clutch of new portables for later in 2026.

item.title: The weirdest tech we've seen at CES 2026 so far
item.description: CES is a launchpad for serious tech, but it’s also where companies proudly unveil devices that make you stop mid-scroll and whisper, “Wait, this is real?” We’ve been keeping a running list of the strangest, funniest and most unexpectedly compelling gadgets we’ve spotted in Las Vegas, from bathroom computers to robots that look like they escaped a Pixar pitch meeting. Also, be sure to check out our list of the best CES tech we saw this year at the show.Dreame Cyber X robot vacuumDreame Cyber XEngadgetRobot vacuums can be a little unsettling already, but Dreame’s Cyber X takes it up a level by s...

item.title: There’s Even More Rumors About Sebastian Stan’s ‘The Batman, Part II’ Role
item.description: Plus, Sam Raimi's return to horror teases some genre-bending elements.

item.title: Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 7's fatal fallout is 'heavier than anyone expected' — and that's for good reason
item.description: With Opiter dead, Korris is rightly on the war path. For the Brothers Ferox in Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 7, that's a near-death experience.

item.title: NASA is ending Crew-11 astronauts' mission a month early
item.description: NASA has decided to bring the Crew-11 astronauts home a month earlier than originally planned due to a “medical concern” with one of them. This is the first time in its history that the space agency is cutting a mission short due to a medical issue, but it didn’t identify the crew member or divulge the exact situation and its severity. The astronauts will be heading back to Earth in the coming days. NASA Administrator Jared Isaacman said the agency will be releasing more details about their flight back home within 48 hours. The agency previously postponed an International Space Station (ISS) s...

item.title: Dolby Vision 2 is coming this year, here’s what you need to know
item.description: Dolby may have announced Dolby Vision 2 a few months ago, but the company gave the new platform its first big reveal at CES 2026. I got the chance to see the improvements in person for the first time, thanks to a variety of demos and Q&A sessions. Dolby Vision 2 will be available this year, but initially, it will be limited. As such, I’ve compiled the info on where the image engine will be available first, and what’s likely to come next in terms of where and how you can use it. But first, let’s quickly summarize what Dolby Vision 2 will even do for your TV. What is Dolby Vision 2?Dolby Vision ...

item.description: Best Buy just launched a huge weekend sale with clearance prices on best-selling TVs, headphones, and laptops, and Apple devices - here's everything I recommend buying.

item.title: Luigi Mangione heads to federal court in Manhattan as he fights to block the death penalty
item.description: It will be Mangione’s first trip to Manhattan federal court since his April 25 arraignment. Luigi Mangione is due in federal court Friday for a pivotal hearing in his fight to bar the government from seeking the death penalty against him in the killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson.Mangione’s lawyers contend that authorities prejudiced his case by turning his December 2024 arrest into a “Marvel movie” spectacle and by publicly declaring their desire to see him executed even before he was formally indicted.If that doesn’t work, they argue, the charge that has enabled the government to ...

item.title: X restricts Grok’s image generation to paying subscribers only after drawing the world’s ire
item.description: Elon Musk's AI company has restricted Grok's controversial AI image-generation feature to only paying subscribers on X, after the tool invited heated criticism from across the world for letting users generate sexualized images of women and children.

item.title: Une carte inédite de l’Univers vient d’être révélée par la NASA avec SPHEREx
item.description: SPHEREx, le télescope spatial de la Nasa, vient de faire une première cartographie nouvelle du ciel en infrarouge. Son but, percer les secrets de l'inflation cosmique, de la formation des galaxies et de l'origine de l'eau dans le Système solaire.

item.title: Antivol qui pue le cadavre et vélo électrique sans batterie : qu’ont donné leur passage sur « Qui veut être mon associé » ?
item.description: Novateurs, le vélo électrique Pi-Pop qui se recharge en roulant et l’antivol vélo CactUs qui sent le cadavre n’ont pas convaincu le jury malgré leurs qualités.

item.title: The best tech announced at CES 2026 so far
item.description: The CES show floor officially closes its doors at the end of the day, but there's still a trickle of announcements and reveals coming out of Las Vegas. If you're struggling to stay on top of all the new tech, gadgets, concepts, and AI-powered devices as the final day of CES gets underway, we're still […]

item.title: Amazon's Kindle is $20 off right now
item.description: If you're one of the many who made a New Year's resolution to read more, an ereader can help by putting your whole library (and more) at your fingertips wherever you are. While not as expensive as an iPad or another flagship tablet, these e-paper devices can be more expensive than you think, but right now you can save on one of our favorites. Amazon's base Kindle is on sale for $90 — that's $20 less than usual and only $10 more than its record-low price. This made our list of the best ereaders, and for good reason. It's an iconic device that gets the job done. It doesn't have much by way of mo...

item.title: CES 2026 Day 3: The most interesting tech that's still on the show floor
item.description: Even as CES 2026 wraps up soon, there’s no shortage of standout hardware hiding in plain sight. From genuinely quieter yard tools to ultra-light EVs and companion robots that want to remember your family, Day 3 was all about tech that felt a little more considered — and in some cases, refreshingly practical.If you can’t get enough of CES, be sure to check out our picks for best of CES 2026, which highlights the most impressive new tech we’ve seen in Las Vegas. We’ve also rounded up the CES gadgets you can buy right now if you’re itching to place an order, along with a look at the weirdest tech...

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 is on sale for a record-low price
item.description:
The Apple Watch Series 11 is on sale for the lowest price we've ever seen. You can pick up the smartwatch for $299, which is 25 percent off its regular price, a discount of $100. Discounts tend to increase as we get closer to September, when the next generation of Apple Watch is typically announced.
The Series 11 is our best overall smartwatch pick, and we gave it a score of 90 out of 100 in our hands-on review. We were impressed with the battery life, which lasted longer than the 24 hours it's rated for in our testing. We also liked how lightweight and thin the watch is. The 9.7mm thick cas...

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : les iPhone d’Apple, Samsung Galaxy et Google Pixel sont à prix cassé dans cette liste des meilleurs bons plans
item.description: Du 7 janvier au 3 février, les soldes d'hiver promettent de faire de bonnes affaires dans la tech, particulièrement auprès des e-commerçants français. C'est par exemple l'occasion de mettre la main sur un smartphone que le Père Noël aurait oublié de déposer au pied du sapin.

item.title: On a testé la nouvelle version des Ray-Ban Meta et leur bracelet neuronal qui ne sont pas encore disponibles en France
item.description: Au CES 2026 Meta et Ray Ban ont dévoilé la dernière mise à jour des lunettes et de leur Neural Band, le bracelet connecté qui les accompagne. Dotées de nouvelles fonctionnalités, elles s’imposent comme le modèle le plus avancé du marché.

item.title: Jobs report for December forecasted to show modest gains in U.S. workforce
item.description: Economists are forecasting a gain of 55,000 jobs to the U.S. economy in December 2025. Hiring likely remained subdued last month as many companies have sought to avoid expanding their workforces, though the job gains may be enough to bring down the unemployment rate.December’s jobs report, to be released Friday, is likely to show that employers added a modest 55,000 jobs, economists forecast. That figure would be below November’s 64,000 but an improvement after the economy lost jobs in October. The unemployment rate is expected to slip to 4.5%, according to data provider FactSet, from a four-y...
